message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at an introductory price of $8500. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I am looking for a more affordable option. Would you consider lowering the price to $7500?

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value and benefits of our product, I'm willing to negotiate further. I propose an adjusted price of $8000 for the product. This still reflects its high quality and unique features, while providing a better value proposition for you.
